mintPress.title: Sorting Facts From Fiction About the US Withdrawal From Syria
mintPress.teaser: If one believes in the restoration of international law and the tenets of the UN Charter, then the withdrawal of U.S. military forces from northern Syria is a good thing. Here are some facts and history that explain why.

mintPress2.title: Under Fire from Ukraine and Misperceived by the West, The People of the DPR Share Their Stories
mintPress2.teaser: Eva Bartlett traveled to the besieged Donetsk People’s Republic to see firsthand how residents are faring amidst a western-backed Ukrainian incursion.
